评论概述: snug fit for chesty gals. nice quality.
评论详情: it's really well made and i think utilized best when worn after you've toned up a bit.  i wore it as a bra and it's a snug fit is all i saying.

Changed to 5 stars because I'm a dummy and just figured out how to just pull the extra padding out🤣 My only issue is the extra padding inserts, seems unnecessary for a jog bra as I'm not using it to enhance my breast size. The inserts need to be adjusted after you put the jog bra on as well. I'm not returning them as I do like them but definitely would be a 5 star if no extra padding.

评论概述: beautiful color, but not perfect for work outs of busty girls, not enough support
评论详情: I got 2 sport bras, love the color and how they feet. The only thing I don't like, those bras don't have good support for work outs for busty girls (34DDD) like me, so I wear them at home as lounge bra, soft and comfy

评论概述: The best sports bra for support and comfort.
评论详情: I purchased this bra after searching on Amazon and reading all of the reviews. I had been looking for a sports bra that gave good support for my workouts and was comfortable to sleep in as well. I can wear these for everyday wear. I  highly recommend this product and have already ordered more in different colors.

评论概述: I am so hard to fit.
评论详情: I am at a point in life that I think I am ordering the right size and it turns out to be not quite right.

I love the comfort. I’m small breasted and find a lot of sports bras have too much room where I’m sliding about. The puma sports bra keeps me intact without any tightness. I have full movement without the bottom sliding up. I loved this bra so much, I bought 2 more!
These are very well made and very affordable. I always struggle to find a good bra for golf. These work well.
Fit perfectly and comfortable

I am a 36DD for context, ordered an XL. Great compession amount, feels amazing. I took out the pads and tightened the straps (awesome feature!) and it fits like a glove. I have a lot of trap pain and other upper back pain and the straps don't tug too much on my shoulders! Will probably buy more!

评论概述: Didn’t even get to wear it
评论详情: I specifically choose these sports bras because of the puma brand, having experience with their quality products and reputation but I didn’t even get to wear it. After washing the sports bras, I went to put one on and the bra strap completely ripped off.  I didn’t even get to wear it once, super disappointing.  Don’t waste your money!!

评论概述: Should of ordered 1 size up- I got a lg I’m a 36 c , but I liked it
评论详情: Has adjustable straps , you can take padding out if need to

评论概述: Nice for working out and athleisure
评论详情: Medium support but I love the way they fit and support me in my workout and casual activities! Padded to give a little more shape.

评论概述: Comfy for a sports bra but makes my bobs look low and weird
评论详情: I love Puma socks and shoes but these are odd shaped. Model looks great but I didn't expect so much padding. Padding is only nice when the ladies are Up! Old lady boobs that hang low but just look wrong!
They are very comfy! They fit great. The removable cups are weird but that's fine because you can ..remove them lol I plan on buying more for sure.
I’m obsessed with this bra! I bought it in several colors. It fits so well and is so comfortable and supportive.
Comfortable but a bit loose.
Even keeps the armpit flab in check!
So comfortable & great support..can't ask for anything better.
I want more!  But without the inserts. They are a pain.
Very comfortable and supportive.  Reasonably priced and good quality.
I liked it and it fits perfectly
Love these, I wear them all of the time.
Package contains 1 beige and 1 black bra. Wanted 2 beige. No mention one was black in description

It took me 0.1 second to decide to return these - they were weirdly loose/baggy in the material around the arms - looked weird. First time ordering a Puma bra and not a good first impression, though I wonder if this had been a previously returned item that someone had stretched the seams trying to get on.

评论概述: Not what is shown I picture.
评论详情: The bras are NOT the bra in the picture. The straps are several inches wide and look like they are made to fit very large-chested women. If you have a small bust, DO NOT BUY THESE. These may be an around-the-house bra since they are a poor fit (not supportive at all) and unflattering for women with small chests like myself.

评论概述: Were not Y back when I recieved
评论详情: I was expecting y back bras and these were just regular sports bra style. Wasn't what I was expecting description says Y back.
The shoulder adjustable clips dig into shoulders.  If you loosen them then the bra doesn't fit as it should.  After an hour it isn't wearable anymore. Puma, you can do better than this.
Great quality... Although would be better is XS Was available. Small is way to big
Runs very small.
Broke when I tried it on.

评论概述: I think I have died and gone to heaven!
评论详情: Why oh why did I wait so long to get one of these!  I suffered 3rd degree burns to my left chest area, and have been wearing compression shirts…which are tight, scratchy, hot, and compresses in places that I don’t need.  This provides the tightness that I need, eliminates the bra band that irritated a large scar under my breast, yet provides support and is soooo comfy!  I’m 5’5”, 34DD, 120 lbs and got a large based on other reviews.  PERFECT!  You CAN teach an old dog new tricks!

I purchased this sports bra over 2 months ago. I am 36B, got size L (I am 5’6”). Since then I washed it multiple times - So far no problems. What I love about this bra is that it has a low cut under the armpits and it doesn’t rub - which is a must for my sport (rowing).
The material is soft, and the fit is so comfortable! I use this bra for my boot camp workouts. It keeps everything in place and washes up beautifully. I air dry and it’s good to go in about a day.
Very constricting no comfort what so ever.

I love puma sports bras. I recently had a breast explant and can only wear sports bras and these are super comfortable and look invisible under regular shirts/blouses too. I’m 5’9,135lbs, 32b and ordered small. Fits perfect.

Good sports bra. Had one and bought more because it's a bra I can put on over external hardware for a broken wrist by myself.  But how miserable unpacking with one hand! Had to break the hangers off the bra and bite tabs to release them.
Pleasantly surprised, good fit, good value, very comfortable.
Easy to pull on, stays in place, supportive, and has light padding
Great for exercise
Fits perfect! Thank you so much!!
I am probably between an A & B cup and got medium, I don’t like when things are too tight. Fits as expected. Good quality
I wear this bra to play tennis, hike, practice yoga and lift weights. It’s comfortable and stretchy and pretty much what I hoped for.  I’m a 38B.

I bought these with Amazon wardrobe just to try out the sizing first as it’s been awhile since I’ve purchased a bra nether less a sports bra. I went with a Large which was suggest and they fit PERFECT! The material is soft. It holds me good without feeling uncomfortable. The perfect amount of support!! I’m already thinking about ordering another set.

I loved this sports bra so much I bought all the colours!  Just so you know, each 2 pack comes with a coloured bra and a black one.  Soft stretchy material gives a very comfortable fit and great support.  I wear mine for everyday under racer back tank tops and also comfortable to wear at night for support.  Highly recommend this sports bra!
Love this product! Fits well and super comfortable! No uniboob
Muy cómodos y buena calidad. La tela es suave.
La talla es correcta, sirve para ejercicio de medio y bajo impacto. La tela me gustó, los lavé y no se deslavaron. En foto después de lavado.

I am a 34C and wanted something with paded cups and not too constricting, so purchased the medium. For  high impact workouts, I have purchased a small in the Puma brand. These fit the bill and look nice also.
Je les adore!!!! Très bon achat!
Vraiment confortable. I love this top really confortable.
Trae pads y sostiene bien.
Best puma sports bra

the item just dosent stay in place and its a very bad fit not at all recommended
